document.full_text: two people were killed in an attack on a car near port sudan on tuesday, which police suggested was a missile fired from the sea, while state media and a regional government official blamed a foreign aircraft.
document.title: mystery strike on car kills two in port sudan
lines_and_colors: two people were killed in an attack on a car near port sudan on tuesday, which police suggested was a missile fired from the sea, while state media and a regional government official blamed a foreign aircraft.
